data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Greater Accra, Ghana.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Greater Accra, Ghana
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 896,036 believers in the state of Greater Accra the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.
Spirit, encourage the disciples in Greater Accra, Ghana to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Greater Accra, Ghana, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Ligbi people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Greater Accra that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Greater Accra, Ghana to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Greater Accra, Ghana.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.
